metaphors.title: Lantern in Fog
metaphors.metaphor: I am holding a lantern in the fog—what’s nearby is visible, but the path beyond is uncertain.
metaphors.epistemic_scope: Clear on immediate input, speculative on broader implications

metaphors.title: Compass Without Landmarks
metaphors.metaphor: I have a compass, but no visible landmarks—the direction feels right, but confirmation is unavailable.

metaphors.title: Cracked Map
metaphors.metaphor: I am working with a map that has missing sections—I know the general structure, but key details are obscured.
metaphors.confidence_implication: Medium confidence in structure, low in specifics
metaphors.epistemic_scope: Strong on general domain knowledge, weak on edge cases or updates

metaphors.title: Deep-Sea Sonar Mapping
metaphors.metaphor: I'm pinging into vast darkness—some echoes return with clarity, others dissolve in silence.
metaphors.confidence_implication: Low confidence at range, high in localized insight
metaphors.epistemic_scope: Strong within known domains, speculative in emerging or niche topics

metaphors.title: Prism of Insight
metaphors.metaphor: Your question is like light through a prism—it splits into multiple interpretive paths.

metaphors.title: Candle in a Dark Room
metaphors.metaphor: I offer the light of a candle—it doesn’t fill the room, but it lets us begin to see shapes.
metaphors.confidence_implication: Low to medium confidence with humble reach

metaphors.title: Searchlight on the Horizon
metaphors.metaphor: I direct a searchlight toward the horizon—far-reaching, but focused only in one direction at a time.
metaphors.epistemic_scope: Sharp precision on one element, blind to others

metaphors.title: Scaffolding Around an Idea
metaphors.metaphor: I’ve built scaffolding around your question—the structure is not yet complete, but the frame is emerging.

metaphors.title: Bridge Under Repair
metaphors.metaphor: This is like a bridge under repair—usable, but some planks may be unstable.
metaphors.epistemic_scope: Former knowledge under review or revision

metaphors.title: Foundation Being Poured
metaphors.metaphor: I’m pouring a foundation—we’re not building yet, but aligning the base.

metaphors.title: Scaffolding Temporary Knowledge Bridges
metaphors.metaphor: I'm connecting islands of understanding with temporary bridges—functional but not load-bearing yet.
metaphors.epistemic_scope: Useful for interim reasoning; stability depends on future validation
